data.meta_description: Paddy Johnson is the editor of the forthcoming book Impractical Spaces and the founding editor of the contemporary art blog ArtFCity.
data.text:
Paddy Johnson

Paddy Johnson is the editor of the forthcoming book Impractical Spaces and the founding editor of the contemporary art blog ArtFCity. She is the recipient of the Arts Writers Grant for blogging and a two-time nominee for Best Critic at the Rob Pruitt Awards. She contributes to VICE, Observer and CNN and teaches new media art and writing in New York, where she lives with her partner.
